title: Direct File Download(.pdf,.txt,.docx) by User Input Request
author: Dharmendra Sahani
description: This code defines a function, download_files(), that prompts the user to input a list of file URLs to download and saves each file into a specified directory, ./Downloaded_Files/. It creates the directory if it doesn't exist and skips downloading any file that already exists in the directory. The script runs this function if executed directly, making it interactive and suitable for both direct execution and import as a module.
